text: Edith Elizabeth Enke, also known as Edie Adams (April 16, 1927 â€“ October 15, 2008Encyclopaedia Britannica Almanac 2010 (), p. 76 Obituaries), was an American business woman, singer, actress and comedienne. She won several Tony and Emmy Awards for her acting. She played Eileen Sherwood in the Broadway play Wonderful Town.William A. Everett; Paul R. Laird, The A to Z of the Broadway Musical (Lanham: Rowman & Littlefield Publishers Group, 2009), p. 2 She also played Miss Olsen in the movie The Apartment. Adams was born in Kingston, Pennsylvania. She was married to Ernie Kovacs from 1954 until his death in 1962. She died from pneumonia and cancer at age 81 in Los Angeles. == References == Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:Comedians from Pennsylvania Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:1927 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Tony Award winning actors
title: Edie Adams
